data.message: Can you please get in touch with me about my real account being hacked by someone in China?  And why I can't reset my password?  I've sent a PM with details but no response?

replies.message: Hi Bethany! If you think someone else has access to your account, please secure it here: http://bit.ly/2ru9kSC. You can also find detailed information about the tools and extra security features you can use to help keep your account secure at: http://bit.ly/2rMqyak. -Jon
Thank you for responding, but I have tried SEVERAL times to reset it and it will not allow it...says I have too many attempts..and it said that the first time I tried.
